oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Order of Saints Maurice and Lazarus certificate.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Certificate from King Victor Emmanuel III of Italy awarding George H. Harries the grade of Commander in the Order of Saints Maurice and Lazarus. Certificate from a scapbook album of photographs and documents about Harries. He commanded the U.S. Mission in Berlin, Germany, and the Inter-Allied Commission for the Repatriation of Prisoners of War after the Armistice. He presumably received this award for work repatriating Italian prisoners of war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
